scripts.start: npm start --prefix server & npm start --prefix ui
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm run test-coverage --prefix ui
scripts.test-e2e: npm start --prefix server & npm run start-test --prefix ui
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy && npm run deploy --prefix server
scripts.outdated-all: (echo CLI: && npm outdated || true) && (echo UI: && npm outdated --prefix ui || true) && (echo SERVER: && npm outdated --prefix server || true)
scripts.install-all: npm run delete-all && npm ci && npm ci --prefix ui && npm ci --prefix server
scripts.update-package-json-all: npm install npm-check-updates --no-save && ncu -u && pushd ui && ncu -u && popd && pushd server && ncu -u && popd
scripts.update-all: npm run update-package-json-all && npm run delete-all && rm package-lock.json ui/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json && npm install && pushd ui && npm install && popd && pushd server && npm install && popd && npm run force-https && npm run outdated-all
